name: hospital-api
description: Weâ€™re going to design an API for the doctors of a Hospital which has been allocated by the govt for testing and quarantine + well being of COVID-19 patients - There can be 2 types of Users - Doctors - Patients - Doctors can log in - Each time a patient visits, the doctor will follow 2 steps - Register the patient in the app (using phone    number, if the patient already exists, just return the patient info in the API) - After the checkup, create a Report - Patient Report will have the following fields - Created by doctor - Status (patient status like:- fever , malaria etc):
